config.siddhiApp: @App:name('APIMApiAvailabilitySiddhi') @store(type='rdbms' , datasource='APIM_ANALYTICS_DB') define table ApimApiAvailabilityInfo(apiName string,apiVersion string,apiCreator string,tenantDomain string,status string);

queryData.apiavailablequery: from ApimApiAvailabilityInfo on tenantDomain=='{{tenantDomain}}' select status,count(apiName) as count group by status;
